description_html:
BodyLove is the new sauna + hammam system designed by Rodolfo Dordoni with Michele Angelini for Effegibi that becomes an integral part of the architectural interior rather than being separate elements ( often relegated to the basement ). The sauna and hammam are experienced as part of an aesthetic environment, adding to the many health and spiritual benefits they provide.

Effegibi's well known "Perfect Wellness" advanced technology and controls are of course integral parts of BodyLove. All products are CSA approved for use in the USA.
